channel.description: Recent content in Latex on Josef Spjut

item.title: Multiple Author Affiliations in LaTeX
item.description: I’ve recently had the pleasure of updating a recent journal article submission with my list of affiliations. On the article, there are 5 authors, and among them, I am the only one with different affiliations, though I share the other affiliation with the rest of the authors. After some quick googling on how I should perform this, I came up with the following snippet of code that should have worked.
